text:
An 11{+t}{+h}standard girl A. Gandhi Priya (16) of Karimedu committed suicide after she was depressed over her father’s death on Saturday.

The police said that the girl was depressed as the family had huge debts for her father’s ailment. However, her father died some eight months back.

The Karimedu police are investigating.

Electrocuted

An employee of a workshop S. Thangaraj was electrocuted at Iyer Bungalow on Saturday.

The police said the deceased was involved in water servicing when he came in contact with electric supply following a leakage. The Tallakulam police are investigating.
title: Suicide alleged
